topics.body: So for context, my now ex-boyfriend bought me the Metal Gear Solid Legacy Collection for my PS3 for christmas one year. Now I have never played MGS 4. I've seen friends play it but that's about it. WHY THE FUCK DOES IT TAKE SIXTEEN MINUTES TO INSTALL?!
